SEARCH
Package org.team21.game.models.map

Class Continent

java.lang.Object
org.team21.game.models.map.Continent
public class Continent extends Object
Continent Class for the information storage of Continent IDs, their Control Values and Country within that continent A Hashmap is used to store all the countries belonging to one Continent, Key is CountryId and the Value is its object.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Tejasvi, Kapil
